column5: I'm planning to take my nephew to the LOTW-Rainy River area for a two day trip but need a little help finding a good guide. Iwould appreciate all the help I can get. We want to fish for walleye and pike. thanks in advance Richard
I am a guide on the river and the lake, I have a 18 ft. smokerr craft w/top. I have daily rates as well as 3,5 and 7 day trips. please email me back.
